thread.title: Avvo Helps Attorneys Achieve Success in New On-Demand, Mobile, Legal Market with 7th Annual Lawyernomics Conference, April 7-9, 2016 in Las Vegas
thread.title_full: Avvo Helps Attorneys Achieve Success in New On-Demand, Mobile, Legal Market with 7th Annual Lawyernomics Conference, April 7-9, 2016 in Las Vegas - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Avvo Helps Attorneys Achieve Success in New On-Demand, Mobile, Legal Market with 7th Annual Lawyernomics Conference, April 7-9, 2016 in Las Vegas
text:
Avvo, Inc.
Relationship Marketing Expert Scott Stratten and Content Marketing Pioneer Ann Handley to Keynote
SEATTLE , Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Avvo, Inc., the leading online legal marketplace connecting lawyers and consumers, today announced that Lawyernomics 2016 , its 7th annual legal marketing and business conference for lawyers, will be held April 7-9, 2016 at The Wynn Las Vegas. Scott Stratten , relationship marketing expert and president of Un-Marketing, who is regarded as one of the top 5 social media influencers in the world, will deliver the opening keynote. Ann Handley , the world's first chief content officer and best-selling author of definitive content marketing guide, "Everybody Writes," will deliver an afternoon keynote. Stratten and Handley join Avvo founder and CEO Mark Britton , who will speak on the future of law in an increasingly on-demand world.
Expected to sell out for the third year in a row, Lawyernomics 2016 features industry leading speakers sharing best practices about marketing to the new legal consumer -- from mobile search marketing, to lead conversion, to video marketing, and insight into the minds of consumers seeking legal help from Avvo's Law and Society Analyst, Nika Kabiri , JD PhD.
Avvo will provide several onsite resources to help attendees grow their practice, including professional headshots, Avvo profile optimization, website audits, gadget troubleshooting, and more. Networking opportunities will also be available, kicking off with a complimentary welcome reception overlooking the Wynn golf course, and culminating in a hosted cocktail reception at the Wynn's elegant XS Nightclub, winner of Conde-Nast Travelers' 'Reader's Choice Award.'
"Consumer demand for transparent and convenient delivery of quality services, within almost every area of their lives, presents a tremendous opportunity for attorneys who are able to successfully meet these heightened expectations," said Leigh McMillan , vice president of marketing, Avvo. "Lawyernomics 2016 provides attorneys with the resources they need to succeed in this world of evolving consumer demands through actionable insights, hands-on training, and shared success stories."
Registration
Space is limited. For more information or to register for Lawyernomics 2016, please visit http://conferences.avvo.com/ . Early bird ticket pricing is now available at a rate of $600 per person. For information about sponsorship opportunities, please contact ross@avvo.com .
About Avvo, Inc.
Avvo is the leading online legal marketplace connecting consumers and lawyers. Avvo offers on-demand, affordable legal advice through Avvo Advisor® , which delivers a highly reviewed lawyer for 15 minutes over the phone – anytime, anywhere – available online or via a free app for iOS devices . In Avvo's Q&A forum , consumers can get their legal questions answered for free by more than 230,000 participating lawyers or search more than 7.5 million previously asked questions and attorney provided answers. Avvo's lawyer directory provides Avvo-rated profiles, client reviews, and peer endorsements for 97% of all lawyers in the U.S., so consumers can find the lawyer who's right for them. Avvo also helps lawyers grow their businesses with marketing tools and services including the Avvo JD App and Avvo Ignite, a cloud-based marketing platform designed specifically for attorneys. Avvo, Avvo Advisor, Avvo JD App, and Avvo Ignite are trademarks or registered trademarks of Avvo, Inc. Avvo was founded in 2006 and is based in Seattle , WA.
